sources.title: Just Say Goodbye | Full Drama Movie
sources.description:
**This film is under non-exclusive license from Leomark Studios. All rights received**

Just Say Goodbye - Sarah slashes down the days to her summer vacation trip with all the gusto of Zorro and his infamous 'Z', until she discovers her best friend's plot to end his life while she's away.

2017
Stars: Katerina Eichenberger, Max MacKenzie, William Galatis

Welcome to Movie Central. Subscribe and watch more Awesome Movies.
